title: Research Consent Form Header
body:
RESEARCH PARTICIPATION CONSENT FORM

{{university.name}}
{{university.address}}
{{university.city_state_postcode}}

title: Purpose of Research
body:
Purpose of Research

This research project aims to investigate and evaluate the effectiveness of the {{project.title}}. Your participation will contribute to the development and validation of this system.

Primary Investigator: {{researcher.name}}
Email: {{researcher.email}}
Phone: {{researcher.phone}}

Project Supervisor: {{supervisor.name}}
Email: {{supervisor.email}}

title: What Participation Involves
body:
What Your Participation Involves

  • Duration: {{study.duration}}
  • Location: {{study.location}}
  • Activities: Your participation will involve using the system, providing feedback, and participating in interviews or surveys as required.
  • Time Commitment: The total time commitment is expected to be approximately as specified in the study duration.

title: Risks and Benefits
body:
Risks and Benefits

Potential Risks:

  • Minimal risk is anticipated for this study
  • Time commitment required for participation
  • Possible minor inconvenience during data collection

Potential Benefits:

  • Contribution to academic research and system development
  • Opportunity to experience and evaluate new technology
  • Access to research findings upon completion

title: Confidentiality and Privacy
body:
Confidentiality and Privacy

All information collected during this research will be treated as confidential and will be handled in accordance with the Australian Privacy Principles and relevant university policies.

  • Your personal information will be de-identified in all reports and publications
  • Only the research team will have access to identifiable data
  • Data will be stored securely in password-protected systems
  • Research data will be retained for {{data.retention.period}} as per university policy

title: Use of Data
body:
Use of Research Data

Data collected during this research may be used for:

  • Academic publications and conference presentations
  • Project reports and thesis completion
  • System improvement and development
  • Teaching and educational purposes (in de-identified form)

All uses will maintain participant confidentiality and comply with ethical research standards.

title: Withdrawal Rights
body:
Your Rights as a Participant

Participation in this research is entirely voluntary. You have the right to:

  • Withdraw from the study at any time without penalty or prejudice
  • Request that your data be removed from the study (up until data analysis begins)
  • Decline to answer any questions without explanation
  • Ask questions about the research at any time
  • Request a copy of the research findings

If you wish to withdraw or have concerns, please contact {{researcher.name}} at {{researcher.email}}

title: Consent Declaration
body:
Consent Declaration

By signing this form, I confirm that:

[CHECKBOX] I have read and understood the information provided about this research project

[CHECKBOX] I have had the opportunity to ask questions and have had them answered to my satisfaction

[CHECKBOX] I understand that my participation is voluntary and I can withdraw at any time

[CHECKBOX] I understand how the data collected will be used and stored

[CHECKBOX] I consent to participate in this research project

[CHECKBOX] I consent to my data being used for academic publications (in de-identified form)

[CHECKBOX] I would like to receive a summary of the research findings (optional)

title: Researcher Declaration
body:
Researcher Declaration

I have provided information about this research project to the participant and believe they understand the nature and purpose of the research.

Researcher Name (Print):
_________________________________
Researcher Signature:
_________________________________
